There are no words to express how much I love love love this place.  It was one of the most memorable experiences I had in Barca.  Our first day in Barcelona and we hit up La Boqueria and managed to find El Quim.  Two of my friends and I were scrambling to get a seat, since it's purely bar tapas seating.  We find two, and I manage to stand.  El Quim himself grabs a chair from inside and brings it out for me.  We order the potatoes (I've honestly never had anything like this, AMAZING), artichokes, shrimp, to start with.  All of a sudden, Quim starts brining out other dishes to try such as their catalan style bread, octopus, mojito sorbet, and a glass of champagne for each of us.  Again, no words.  The food was amazing, pure, and delightful.  The service and atmosphere made this even more memorable.
